text: (kukaiyilirunta avarkal) munru pertan; nankavatu avarkalutaiya nay enru (cilaru)m; (avarkal) aintu per, avarkalutaiya nay aravatakum enru (veru cilaru)m; maraivana visayankalait tankal kantupitittu vittavarkalaip pol (mikka urutiyakak) kurukinranar.
